results.title: Repurposing of cholesterol-lowering agents in status epilepticus: A neuroprotective effect of simvastatin.
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_10090 @@@Mice@@@ treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ had significantly fewer generalized @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@ during the first three hours without a significant effect on generalized @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@ after two weeks.

citations.NLM: Hanin A, Roussel D, Lecas S, Baudin P, Navarro V. Repurposing of cholesterol-lowering agents in status epilepticus: A neuroprotective effect of simvastatin. Epilepsy Behav. 2023 Apr;141():109133. PMID: 36813661
citations.BibTeX: @article{36813661, title={Repurposing of cholesterol-lowering agents in status epilepticus: A neuroprotective effect of simvastatin.}, author={Hanin A and Roussel D and Lecas S and Baudin P and Navarro V}, journal={Epilepsy Behav}, volume={141}, pages={109133}}

results.title: The effect of simvastatin on picrotoxin-induced seizure in mice.

citations.NLM: Kesim M, Yulug E, Kadioglu M, Erkoseoglu I, Aykan DA, Kalyoncu NI, Yaris E. The effect of simvastatin on picrotoxin-induced seizure in mice. J Pak Med Assoc. 2012 Nov;62(11):1187-91. PMID: 23866408
citations.BibTeX: @article{23866408, title={The effect of simvastatin on picrotoxin-induced seizure in mice.}, author={Kesim M and Yulug E and Kadioglu M and Erkoseoglu I and Aykan DA and Kalyoncu NI and Yaris E}, journal={J Pak Med Assoc}, volume={62}, number={11}, pages={1187-91}}

results.title: [Protective effects of levetiracetam and simvastatin on pilocarpine-induced epilepsy in rat models].
results.journal: Sichuan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban
results.text_hl: Compared with the saline-treated cells, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ did not decrease severe cell death (P>0.05), but @CHEMICAL_Levetiracetam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077287 @@@levetiracetam@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Levetiracetam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077287 @@@levetiracetam@@@+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ decreased severe cell death 24 h after @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@ (P<0.05).

citations.NLM: Li MQ, Zhang WW, Chen T, Liu L. [Protective effects of levetiracetam and simvastatin on pilocarpine-induced epilepsy in rat models]. Sichuan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban. 2015 Mar;46(2):201-4. PMID: 25924429
citations.BibTeX: @article{25924429, title={[Protective effects of levetiracetam and simvastatin on pilocarpine-induced epilepsy in rat models].}, author={Li MQ and Zhang WW and Chen T and Liu L}, journal={Sichuan Da Xue Xue Bao Yi Xue Ban}, volume={46}, number={2}, pages={201-4}}

results.title: Simvastatin is the statin that most efficiently protects against kainate-induced excitotoxicity and memory impairment.
results.text_hl: To this end, we studied @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegeneration@@@ in a @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model by systemic administration of @CHEMICAL_Kainic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007608 @@@kainate@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ was the most effective statin in reducing the deleterious effects caused by @CHEMICAL_Kainic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D007608 @@@kainate@@@, including the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizures@@@, excitotoxicity, oxidative damage, @DISEASE_Plaque_Amyloid @DISEASE_MESH:D058225 @@@neuritic dystrophy@@@ and apoptosis in the hippocampus and other limbic structures of the brain cortex.

citations.NLM: Ramirez C, Tercero I, Pineda A, Burgos JS. Simvastatin is the statin that most efficiently protects against kainate-induced excitotoxicity and memory impairment. J Alzheimers Dis. 2011;24(1):161-74. PMID: 21224519
citations.BibTeX: @article{21224519, title={Simvastatin is the statin that most efficiently protects against kainate-induced excitotoxicity and memory impairment.}, author={Ramirez C and Tercero I and Pineda A and Burgos JS}, journal={J Alzheimers Dis}, volume={24}, number={1}, pages={161-74}}

results.title: Statins - are they anticonvulsant?
results.text_hl: Hereby, we present available experimental data regarding action of this group of drugs on @<m>DISEASE_Seizures</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@ activity and neuronal cell death.

citations.NLM: Banach M, Czuczwar SJ, Borowicz KK. Statins - are they anticonvulsant? Pharmacol Rep. 2014 Aug;66(4):521-8. PMID: 24948050
citations.BibTeX: @article{24948050, title={Statins - are they anticonvulsant?}, author={Banach M and Czuczwar SJ and Borowicz KK}, journal={Pharmacol Rep}, volume={66}, number={4}, pages={521-8}}
